ICalc

This component allows a mathematical expression to be entered in the Expression parameter, and performs an operation on the data inputs [In]A, [In]B, [In]C, [In]D and presents the result to the data output.

The integer operations that are supported are as follows: +, -, *, /, %, ^, abs(x), square(x), min(x,y), max(x,y), sin(α,Θ), cos(α,Θ) where α is a multiplier applied to the result and Θ is the angle. Any one of the data inputs A to D can be substituted for x,y,α or Θ, for example (A*B)/square(B).

Ports

  • [In] A:

    Data input.

  • [In] B:

    Data input.

  • [In] C:

    Data input.

  • [In] D:

    Data input.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the result of the calculation.

  • [In] :

    Input event, performs the calculation specified by the Expression parameter on the data inputs.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

  • Expression:

    The expression to calculate.

    Data Type:

    S,

    Min Value:

    None,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    None

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
